name: part_008
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら6周年記念LIVE】周年3D LIVE！ぺこらRUSH！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [E2D_YFRHFG8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora, IRyS, and Nerissa Ravencroft perform a high-energy mashup of 'RE:I AM' and 'Gamble' on a slot-machine-themed stage.
A visual interlude featuring a slot machine animation and Usada Pekora declaring a 'Bonus' win.
Usada Pekora is joined by Ookami Mio, Nakiri Ayame, La+ Darknesss, and Shiranui Flare for a grand performance of 'Nijiiro no Flügel'.
